my.title: Toread.today
my.description: A cloud tool to organise things to read/watch later. Priorities, tags, statuses and other fancy stuff. Web, Desktop & Mobile app, Google Chrome extension.

my.title: The Seed
my.description: A one-person SaaS application codebase template. Ship your project idea in days instead of months. ⚠️ It is addictive.

my.title: Blog
my.description: Classic blog where I talk mostly about technical aspects of developing a SaaS, but also about Arduino and travel stuff.

my.title: YouTube Tech Channel
my.description: Short tech videos about software development and SaaS.

my.title: Arduino DIY
my.description: In my free time I do some small DIY electronic devices just for fun or to solve a personal itch.
